title: Possession
description: DARK TEMPTATIONA musician and a maker of fine violins, Alexandra Peters lived alone and preferred it that way. Until she met David de Morrissey. Mysterious and magnetic, he sweeps aside all restraint and compels her to thrilling new heights of ecstasy and erotic fervor. Never before has Alexandra felt so overwhelmed by love--or frightened by her own uncontrollable need.But she has more to fear than a simple seduction -- for David de Morrissey is more than just a man. And once she learns his secret, there can be no turning back.To truly be his, she must surrender her blood, her body, her will, and her soul...
author: Lori Herter
